channel.title: Bank, trade and shop HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
How am i supposed to change this "Close Window" interface on the bank, trading and shop interface to this "X" button down there?
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/1236q15.png[/img]
Someone give me a very very EASY guide/tutorial and i'd be very happy.
My server & client base is; Ben 2012. A version of Iclarity v1.05

item.title: Bank, trade and shop HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @masterkorv12 masterkorv12
item.description:
@masterkorv12 wrote:

I don’t understand what you mean with it? I already got the sprite because i’m using it to my equipment screen. How do i put the sprite in client? WTF, SOMEONE TELL ME A LIL BETTER!
soz

I’m abit stupid

item.title: Bank, trade and shop HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

action buttons in client.java search for case 185 and declare wat u want the ab id to do.
then u need to add that sprite to ur client and compile it
